mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this message finds you well.

Thank you for providing the internal data to update the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC. I have incorporated the latest information, including the details related to PEP screening, into the checklist. 

Please find the updated checklist attached for your review. If you have any further questions or need additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
 Shubham
